component.name: VNCP Manager
component.summary: Cockpit component for VNCP Docker container management

description.p:
The Cockpit user interface for VNCP Docker container management.
VNCP Manager provides a web-based interface for managing Docker containers, images, and volumes through Cockpit. This is a Docker version of the original Podman-based container management interface, specifically adapted for VNCP (VersaNode Control Panel) environments.
